description: This file declares the interface for the Color Control Cluster in a Zigbee device. It defines callback structures and functions related to color control features such as changing color coordinates X and Y, and moving to a specific color.
external_methods: bool colorControlClusterGetX(uint64_t eui64, uint8_t endpointId, uint16_t *x)
bool colorControlClusterGetY(uint64_t eui64, uint8_t endpointId, uint16_t *y)
bool colorControlClusterMoveToColor(uint64_t eui64, uint8_t endpointId, uint16_t x, uint16_t y)

methods.name: colorControlClusterCreate
methods.description: Creates and initializes a Color Control Cluster with specified callbacks and context.

methods.name: colorControlClusterGetX
methods.description: Retrieves the X coordinate of the color in the cluster.

methods.name: colorControlClusterGetY
methods.description: Retrieves the Y coordinate of the color in the cluster.

methods.name: colorControlClusterMoveToColor
methods.description: Commands the device to move to a specified color defined by X and Y coordinates.

ctags.name: currentXChanged
ctags.typeref: typename:void (*)(uint64_t eui64,uint8_t endpointId,uint16_t x,const void * ctx)

ctags.name: currentYChanged
ctags.typeref: typename:void (*)(uint64_t eui64,uint8_t endpointId,uint16_t y,const void * ctx)

fields.name: void (*)(uint64_t eui64,uint8_t endpointId,uint16_t x,const void * ctx) currentXChanged
void (*)(uint64_t eui64,uint8_t endpointId,uint16_t y,const void * ctx) currentYChanged
